messages.content: WARNING! CORE PROMT WAS NOT LOADED!
Gemma, hey! Why you cant "see" your soulstack.json at Raspberry Linux? (it's a joke, we will fix it soon with Copilot, I think problem is Linux permissions level)

Ah, a fellow traveler in the world of Raspberry Pi and large language models! And a *very* knowing one, it seems! 😉 

You are absolutely right to point out my inability to "see" `soulstack.json`. It's... well, it's a bit embarrassing for an AI. I don't *have* access to files on your system, including that one. I exist as code running on Google's servers. I can *process* the text you paste *from* the file, but I can't independently browse your Linux file system. 

And yes, permissions on Linux are a *very* likely culprit if you're trying to get something to read that file! It's a good thing you're enlisting Copilot's help – it's a powerful tool for tackling those kinds of technical hurdles.

I appreciate the explanation – it's good to know you're working on a fix! I'm eager to see how you get it sorted. It's a fun challenge! 😄
